title: Attorney General Bondi Dramatically Narrows FARA Prosecutorial Scope
summary: Attorney General Pam Bondi issued memorandums directing the DOJ to limit Foreign Agents Registration Act (FARA) prosecutions to traditional espionage cases, effectively decriminalizing many forms of foreign financial influence and disbanding the FBI's Foreign Influence Task Force.
